item.title: Cowboy Frogs!
item.description: Yeehaw! Look at these two rootin-tootin cowboys! They love Rstudio more than Python but that's just because they're used to Rstudio!! Below is some code in both Rstudio and Python that shows Dr. Woodword that I can get the two languages to talk to each other! It ain't fancy but it works! #R code chunk hi<-"Hello" #python code chunk hi="world" print(r.hi,hi)#access R-defined objects with r. ## Hello world #R code chunk cat(c(hi,py$hi))#access Python-defined objects with py$ ## Hello world hist(quakes$mag) import re match=re.
